data.eml:eml: A new cheilostome bryozoan genus, Abditoporella (Hippoporidridae), from the eastern Pacific

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sosa-Yañez, Armando, Vieira, Leandro M., Solís-Marín, Francisco A. (2015): A new cheilostome bryozoan genus, Abditoporella (Hippoporidridae), from the eastern Pacific. Zootaxa 3994 (2): 275-282, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3994.2.7
